title: Samsung's One UI 8.5 update keeps leaking, adding '3D' icons and more Liquid Glass vibes [Gallery]

title: T-Mobile’s satellite service now supports Google Maps, WhatsApp, X, and more
snippet: T-Mobile has expanded its satellite-to-cell service to several popular apps in the US, allowing users to stay connected without cellular coverage.
